request.schema: [{"name":"guest_email","label":"Guest email","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":false,"hint":"Guest email address"},{"name":"check_in_date","label":"Check-in date","type":"date","control_type":"date","optional":true,"hint":"Check-in date (ISO 8601 format, defaults to today)"},{"name":"booking_number","label":"Booking number","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Booking confirmation number (optional, for disambiguation)"},{"name":"payment_id","label":"Payment ID","type":"string","control_type":"text","optional":true,"hint":"Stripe payment/charge ID (optional, defaults to PENDING_CHECKIN)"}]

properties.label: Check-in date
properties.name: check_in_date
properties.hint: Check-in date (ISO 8601 format, defaults to today)

properties.label: Payment ID
properties.name: payment_id
properties.hint: Stripe payment/charge ID (optional, defaults to PENDING_CHECKIN)

properties.label: Email
properties.name: email
properties.hint: Contact email address to search for

response.error_message: Guest with email #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","guest_email"]}')} does not exist in Salesforce. Guest profile must exist before check-in.
response.details: ='guest_email: ' + _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","guest_email"]}') + ', action_required: Create guest contact before check-in using create_contact_if_not_found tool'

dynamicPickListSelection.flow_id: Search booking by contact and date

flow_id.name: Search booking by contact and date

properties.label: Booking status
properties.name: status
properties.hint: Booking status to filter by (default: Reserved)

response.error_message: No reservation found for guest on check-in date with Status=Reserved
response.details: ='guest_email: ' + _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","guest_email"]}') + ', contact_id: ' + _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"search_contact","path":["result","id"]}') + ', check_in_date: ' + (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","check_in_date"]}').present? ? _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","check_in_date"]}') : now.to_date.to_s) + ', action_required: Verify reservation exists or create new booking'

response.error_message: Multiple reservations found for guest on check-in date. Please specify room_number or booking_number to disambiguate.
response.details: ='guest_email: ' + _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","guest_email"]}') + ', check_in_date: ' + (_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","check_in_date"]}').present? ? _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_api_platform","line":"trigger","path":["request","check_in_date"]}') : now.to_date.to_s) + ', bookings: ' + _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"search_booking","path":["result","bookings"]}').to_json + ', action_required: Specify room_number or booking_number to disambiguate'

response.error_message: Room #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"search_booking","path":["result","bookings",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"room_number"]}')} is not available for check-in (current status: #{_dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"search_booking","path":["result","bookings",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"room_status"]}')})
response.details: ='room_number: ' + _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"search_booking","path":["result","bookings",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"room_number"]}') + ', current_status: ' + _dp('{"pill_type":"output","provider":"workato_recipe_function","line":"search_booking","path":["result","bookings",{"path_element_type":"current_item"},"room_status"]}') + ', action_required: Wait for room to be ready or assign different room'

properties.label: Current guest ID
properties.name: current_guest_id
properties.hint: Contact ID of guest occupying room

extended_input_schema.hint: Send a copy of the message to Workato logs. Learn more
extended_input_schema.label: Send to Workato log service
extended_input_schema.name: user_logs_enabled
